name: Trinity Tech Demo
description:
THE WHITE ROOM - TECHDEMO - 

The associated interactive tool allows for a user-friendly experience. Engage in navigating, displaying, or playing. Users become room hosts by verifying non-fungible token collection displays rendered in three-dimensional displays. Hosts will benefit from hosting games with a three percent commission from the reward pool. Rewards earned are distributed in Trinity. Trinity has created utility scenarios for projects with non-fungible tokens that may otherwise lack or struggle with utility. Navigational ability and in-game exploration Display of other users’ personalized rooms will be accessible—the ability to walk and explore the space while interacting with the non-fungible token displays. 

Make sure you hold a minimum amount of 3333 TRIN in your wallet when authenticating.

This is a techdemo and doesnt represent the final product. The tool for the demo is limited to loading in a maximum of 50 nfts from a user address.

Controls

Movement  - W, A, S, D

Jump - SPACE

Crouch - Crtl

Interact - E
